original_title: Krzysztof Kieslowski: A Masterclass for Young Directors
overview: Presents highlights of a workshop for young directors conducted by the Polish director Krzysztof Kiewslowski (1941-1996) in Amsterdam during the summer of 1994, inclusive of interviews with Kiewslowski himself. The theme of the workshop was the direction of actors. For a fortnight, various groups worked every day on a scene from Ingmar Bergman's film, 'Scenes from a Marriage.'
title: Krzysztof Kieslowski: A Masterclass for Young Directors
